targets.query:
from(bucket: "gpu-metrics")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "gpu_sessions")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "gpu_temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.scenario == "idle" or r.scenario == "gaming")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.scenario == "idle" or r.scenario == "gaming")
